result.reason: VNC protocol has no dedicated fullscreen mode; the generic F11 FullscreenHandler exists but VncSharpCore.RemoteDesktop supports a native fullscreen/scale mode that is not wired up for VNC connections.
result.approach: Wire VncSharpCore RemoteDesktop's scaling/fullscreen capability into the existing FullscreenHandler toggle (F11), ensuring the VNC control stretches to fill the panel when fullscreen is activated, mirroring the RDP SmartSize pattern.
